name: Talk_Civ1
_source: speak;Ephraim;I heard a young man was staying in this village recently.
speak;OldMan1;Ah, you must mean that eager lad.|Ewan, I think his name was.|Nice boy, full of energy and determination.|Said he was a pupil of some sort, studying magic.
speak;OldMan1;Aye, he was.|Said he was searching for a girl.|A swordswoman, if I recall correctly.|He seemed quite worried about her.|Left heading north not too long ago.
speak;Ephraim;I see.|I hope he found who he was looking for.
speak;OldMan1;As do I, lad.|The roads aren't safe for young folk traveling alone these days.|But that boy had spirit.|I'm sure he'll be alright.
